444560.name: Agent Origins: Escape
444560.description:
Inspired by the groundbreaking video game and created in collaboration with innovative YouTube powerhouses CorridorDigital, RocketJump, and Devin Supertramp, Ubisoft proudly presents Tom Clancy’s The Division™: Agent Origins: Escape. This thrilling live action video follows the life of an agent of The Division as he is activated and leaps headfirst into the fight to save New York City along with his team of 3 agents.

Head here to learn more about Tom Clancy’s The Division™
